content.html: My sister was transferred to a prison work farm in VA, where she'll serve out her sentence. It's one of the nicer prisons in the state. Still, she'll be required to labor 8 hrs/day for $0.45/hr. "I can't believe it, Kristine. It's 2022 and I'm really a slave on a plantation."
content.value:
My sister was transferred to a prison work farm in VA, where she'll serve out her sentence.

It's one of the nicer prisons in the state. Still, she'll be required to labor 8 hrs/day for $0.45/hr. 

"I can't believe it, Kristine. It's 2022 and I'm really a slave on a plantation."
